data.text: @Forbes They forgot the huge increase in alcohol consumption. All .. not a good combination

@Godfather_Ray @Forbes I bet though that people that had a problem with gambling definitely had a big chance to spiral out of control even more in the Covid period. Gambling ruins people financially even faster than heroine.
@nogeenik1 @Forbes Oh I thought it was gambling....my bad

@Godfather_Ray @Forbes Yes gambling but that was not what they where talking about like every time a tragedy happens like with guns they also like to blame it on gaming so to not have to look at gun laws. I meant gaming like Xbox etcetera.
@Forbes At least some good came out of all this :)
@nogeenik1 @Forbes Gambling is an addiction like sex and drugs...there's a common thread there

@Forbes #gaming is not a negative hobby those who do get in trouble prob have some behavior related issue that would get them in problems just as much without games. And beyond this there are many people who learned to be more social thanks to a great hobby. Blaming games is lazy
@Forbes Other countries became it to after UN
@Forbes In limits of those things are banned and illegal.
